    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory2, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, androidx.activity.OnBackPressedDispatcherOwner, androidx.appcompat.app.ActionBarDrawerToggle.DelegateProvider, androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatCallback, androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat.OnRequestPermissionsResultCallback, androidx.core.app.ActivityCompat.RequestPermissionsRequestCodeValidator, androidx.core.app.TaskStackBuilder.SupportParentable, androidx.core.view.KeyEventDispatcher.Component, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    _MainBaseActivity, _ServerBaseActivity

    public abstract class _BaseActivity
extends androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
    Represents the standard basic activity layer for threadapp.
    Since:
    2.0

                        android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)

        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - Default parameter for the onCreate event.

        protected void onStart()
        The default onStart event for a basic activity. Listeners are attached here, if any.
        Overrides:
        onStart in class androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity

      • onResume

        protected void onResume()
        The default onResume event for a basic activity. The bottom toolbar menu is redrawn here.
        Overrides:
        onResume in class androidx.fragment.app.FragmentActivity

      • onRestart

        protected void onRestart()
        The default onRestart event for a basic activity. The bottom toolbar menu is redrawn here.
        Overrides:
        onRestart in class android.app.Activity

      • onStop

        protected void onStop()
        The default onStop event for a basic activity. Listeners are detached and destroyed here, if any. The current menu item is also toggled back to normal.
        Overrides:
        onStop in class androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity
        See Also:
        toggleCurrentMenuItem(Boolean)

      • onPrepareOptionsMenu

        public boolean onPrepareOptionsMenu(android.view.Menu menu)
        The default onPrepareOptionsMenu event for a basic activity. The current menu item's opacity is reduced as feedback that the user is on that current activity, if possible.
        Overrides:
        onPrepareOptionsMenu in class android.app.Activity
        See Also:
        toggleCurrentMenuItem(Boolean)

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(android.view.Menu menu)
        The default onCreateOptionsMenu event for a basic activity. The menu for the top and bottom toolbars are inflated, if possible.
        Overrides:
        onCreateOptionsMenu in class android.app.Activity

      • setLayoutIDForContentView

        protected abstract int setLayoutIDForContentView()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Should return the layout id to be used in setContentView().

      • setCurrentActivity

        protected abstract androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity setCurrentActivity()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Should return the current class context.

      • setTitleForActivity

        protected abstract java.lang.String setTitleForActivity()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Should return the user-friendly title of the current activity.

      • setMainActionButton

        protected abstract android.widget.ImageButton setMainActionButton()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Should return a configured ImageButton to be used in the current activity.

      • setTopNavToolbarIncludeId

        protected abstract java.lang.Integer setTopNavToolbarIncludeId()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Should return the view id of the top navigation bar's include view object. Else return null if there is no top navigation bar include view object for the current layout.

      • setBottomToolbarAMVIncludeId

        protected abstract java.lang.Integer setBottomToolbarAMVIncludeId()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Should return the view id of the bottom toolbar's include view object. Else return null if there is no top navigation bar include view object for the current layout.

      • DoAdditionalSetupForToolbars

        protected abstract void DoAdditionalSetupForToolbars()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Should run any further toolbar configuration code for the activity required.

      • BindViewObjects

        protected abstract void BindViewObjects()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Binding of subclass objects to their associated view should be implemented here.

      • SetupViewObjects

        protected abstract void SetupViewObjects()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Setup of subclass objects that have been bound should be implemented here.

      • HandleIntentExtras

        protected abstract void HandleIntentExtras()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Should handle any incoming intent extras to the current activity. Optimally, bind these values to an object to save them for later use.

      • HandleAdditionalIntentExtras

        protected abstract void HandleAdditionalIntentExtras()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Second additional layer for HandleIntentExtras.

      • DoAdditionalSetupForFirebase

        protected abstract void DoAdditionalSetupForFirebase()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Should run any further Firebase configuration code for the activity required.

      • AttachListeners

        protected abstract void AttachListeners()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Should attach any Firebase event listeners required for the activity on startup here.

      • DestroyListeners

        protected abstract void DestroyListeners()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Should destroy every Firebase event listener created in the activity.

      • setCurrentMenuItemID

        protected abstract int setCurrentMenuItemID()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Should return the view id of the corresponding menu item for the current activity.

      • setBottomToolbarMenuID

        protected abstract int setBottomToolbarMenuID()
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Should return the menu id of the menu resource to be inflated in the bottom toolbar.

      • setItemsForTopNavToolbar

        protected abstract java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> setItemsForTopNavToolbar(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> itemHashMap)
        Abstract function for subclasses to implement. Should return a HashMap of menu item id : menu item titles of menu items to be added to the top nav toolbar.

      • toggleCurrentMenuItem

        protected void toggleCurrentMenuItem(java.lang.Boolean enabled)
        Toggles the current menu item's opacity. If enabled is true, opacity is set to high. Otherwise, it is set to low opacity (disabled)

      • hideKeyboard

        protected void hideKeyboard()
        This function attempts to hide the software keyboard if it is being shown.

      • sendNotification

        protected void sendNotification(java.lang.String serverId,
                                java.lang.String userId,
                                java.lang.String message)
        Sends a notification to all members in a server Author: Thabith
        Parameters:
        serverId - The current server's id
        userId - The current user's id
        message - The message payload for the notification
